explains: n. 内涵意义，隐含意义，联想意义

sentences.en: The meaning of children's books lies in conveying the profound connotation behind the story.
sentences.cn: 儿童读物的意义在于传达故事背后的深刻内涵。

sentences.en: The very impossibility of absoluteness in the definition of certain nouns adds to the levels of connotation they may reach.
sentences.cn: 在某些名词的定义中，绝对性的不可能性本身就增加了它们可能达到的内涵层次。

sentences.en: As opposed to black, white usually has a positive connotation.
sentences.cn: 与黑色不同，白色常有肯定的含义。
